name: One Against Death
description:
This is a virtual reality game in the genre of reflection of waves, will allow you to try on the role of a psychopath imprisoned in an arena full of zombies. To win, you will have to hold out for 3 rounds. On each round, new weapons will appear, and there will be more and more zombies. It is necessary not to lose sight of more than one enemy, because zombies can sneak up unnoticed and eat you!

System requirements:

The presence of a VR headset Oculus Quest 2.

Control:

Despite the fact that the game in virtual reality involves the direct interaction of controllers with virtual objects in the game there are the following control buttons:

  • Pick up an item - Oculus Touch (L) / (R) Grip
  • Ranged Weapon Shooting - Oculus Touch (L) / (R) Trigger
  • Remove Magazine - Oculus Touch (L) Y / (R) B
  • Teleport - Oculus Touch (R) Thumbstick
  • Rotate - Oculus Touch (L) Thumbstick
  • Calling up the menu - Oculus Touch (L) / (R) Menu
